## Videos

- [Morgan Housel on Diary of a CEO](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uxu37dqVR90)
    - Buy a house because you need to live somewhere, not as an investment. 
    - Stop moving the goalposts on life. Keep things simple to be happy. 
- [AI Agents Debate on Diary of a CEO](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JMYQmGfTltY)
